full_text:
Updated after Week 6: Relative team efficiencies, constructed using a blend of z-score standardized EPA/P and SR%

Data is from early downs, opponent adjusted, turnovers are excluded, garbage time is excluded

#nflverse https://t.co/mqgBO2imz4

#nflverse
Do NFL win probability (WP) streams move too much (with respect to Bayesian updating)?
I applied tests put forward in a 2020 Augenblick and Rabin paper to @nflfastR's vegas-informed WP model. By their tests, on average, no.
https://t.co/xQ1sHGqC8z
@benbbaldwin @Stat_Ron
